title: BARSKA CO11342 Colorado 3-9x40 Riflescope 30/30 Reticle
features: Accuracy, precision and dependability at a popular price
Fully-Coated optics for bright, clear, distortion-free views
Included Accessories Scope Caps and Lens Cloth
description: Now you can have more for less. Accuracy, precision and dependability at a popular price. The 3-9x40 Colorado Riflescope is the perfect choice for serious shooters or hunters who want a wealth of features and performance but don't want to spend a fortune. The Colorado scopes combine high quality optics and rugged construction with accuracy and ease of use. This scope features fully-coated optics for bright, clear, distortion-free views, a 30/30 reticle and rugged 1 Inch monotube construction. If you're looking for a premium riflescope at an affordable price, look no farther than the 3-9x40 Colorado Riflescope. Protected by BARSKA's Limited Lifetime Warranty. Specifications: Magnification 3-9x; Objective Lens 40mm; Reticle: 30/30; Exit Pupil: 13.33-4.44mm; Optical Coating: Fully Coated; Field of View (ft@100yds/m@100m):12.04 ft-37.35 ft.; Focus Type: Eye Bell; Tube Diameter: 1 Inch; Included Accessories: Scope Caps and Lens Cloth.
